resources.string: This will override server list automatic management
Please enter your name, select your country code and input your mobile phone number. More instructions will be provided in the next screen.
If you are unable to receive calls or SMS on this device, insert a phone number you own: we will associate that number to this device.
You should receive a SMS or a call to your number briefly.
Please insert the code you receive or hear below.
Please note that SMS or call might come from a foreign number.
You should receive a missed call to your number briefly. PLEASE DO NOT ANSWER THE CALL.
Please insert the last %d digits of the number you will be called by.

Tap the button below and give a missed call to that phone number. Please note that the call must be initiated from the phone number you are registering. The call is free of charge if you hang up as soon as you hear the first ring. It will be enough for us.
After closing the call, come back here and tap the verify button below.
Please insert the verification code you received. Please note that a verification code can be used only once.
Please enter a valid phone number.
If you go back you\'ll have to start registration from scratch. If you need to switch to another app, just use the device home button.
The entire chat will be deleted.
Only one Kontalk account is supported.
Use this if Kontalk is not working properly
How long to wait before disconnecting for inactivity
How long to wait before reconnecting to the server after an inactivity period. Used only if push notifications are not available or network quality is very bad
Use this in case your personal key has been compromised
A new key pair will be generated and assigned to your account. Your old key will become invalid.
Status message will be visible only to users having your phone number
Status message will be visible to anyone
Users will not see you online
Users will see you online and when you last connected
Contact seems not to be registered on Kontalk.
Unable to store message to outbox. Maybe your memory is full?
Use push notifications if server supports it, saves battery

Push notifications are a server-assisted technology to save battery. It does not affect real-time delivery of messages.\n\nWhen disabled, Kontalk connection behavior can be fine tuned in the network settings screen.
Push notifications support was not included in this version.
Push notifications are not supported on this device.
Display message notifications in status bar
The selected messages will be deleted.
Verification wasn\'t successful. Try to call the number again and wait a little longer.
Too many attempts. Please wait a few minutes and try again.
Verification canceled. You might receive a SMS anyway.
An error occurred during verification. Please try again later.
No Internet connection is available. Kontalk requires an active Internet connection to work.
Unable to connect to server. Please try again later.
Selected server does not support registration. Please configure another one in Settings screen.

The number you are using is already registered to Kontalk. If you have registered another device, proceeding in this manner will cut it off from Kontalk. If you are registering another device of yours, choose transfer account.
Unable to store message to outbox.
Please insert a valid phone number.
We will verify the phone number:
Please double check that the number is correct.
We\'ll try another way to verify your phone number.
Use Menu > Refresh to update contact list.
Unable to refresh contacts list. Please retry later.
Network not available. Please retry later.
Hey! Check out Kontalk, a free messaging app! http://kontalk.org/
New users will be automatically added to this list.\n\nUse Menu > Invite users to send an invitation message to someone.
Recent chats will appear here. You can switch to contacts by using the button above.
To start writing messages use the new message button below.
To archive chats, select them from the main screen and use the archive button in the toolbar.
Unable to write to external storage.
Contact seems not to be registered on Kontalk. You can try to contact the user anyway or send him/her an invitation message.
Pick a background using the option below
An error occurred while setting the background. Please try another image.
Unable to download attachment. Message might be corrupted.
Unable to download server list. Please retry later.
Network not available. Please retry later.
Automatically convert some text smileys to emojis
Remove some dial prefix in Kontalk to match phone numbers correctly
Kontalk will import your keys from %s in your external storage. Be sure that the file exists and it\'s a valid exported keys archive.
Imported key doesn\'t match the phone number you entered.
Unable to read personal key from external storage.
Wrong password. Restart the app to try another one.
Google Maps is not available, falling back to OpenStreetMap.
No location providers available. Current location will not be available.
Unable to request location services activation.
We need access to location. Choose OK to go to settings and enable it.
Unable to write picture file. Taking picture from camera will not be enabled.
No suitable app available to open the file.
No dialer app available to call or no telephony available on this device.
No browser available to open link.
No suitable app available to share the file.
Access to the original file was denied.
In offline mode Kontalk will not connect to the server until you go back to online mode. You will not be able to send or receive messages and users will see you as offline.
Offline mode is active. Messages will be sent when back online.
Kontalk needs money to keep running. Please consider a donation, even a small one.
Generating personal key in the background.
You can continue to work normally.

A personal key is currently unavailable (probably because you just upgraded). You will not be able to login into the Kontalk network if you don\'t generate a personal key. Please insert your name by closing Kontalk and opening it again.
Personal key and login certificate exported to external storage.
Unable to write personal key to external storage.
Something went wrong, but the donation went through. Thank you!
Unable to load personal key. Disable encryption from settings to send message anyway.
Unable to find a public key for this user. Try refreshing your contact list or disable encryption from settings to send message anyway.
Unable to encrypt message. Disable encryption from settings to send message anyway.
Unable to send message. User has not accepted your invitation yet.
Include SIM contacts when checking for registered users
Include contacts not displayed in Contacts app. Enable if you use DAVx⁵ or other contacts sync app
Allow messages from server administrators. You might miss important news if you disable this
Deleting your account will also delete all your messages. Your account on the server will be deleted automatically after a few weeks.

You\'re about to block this user. If you do so, this user won\'t be able to send you any message or media until you unblock him/her. This user also won\'t be able to see your status or last known presence and you won\'t be able to see his/her status too. As a side effect, you won\'t be able to send any message or media to him/her either.
You\'re about to unblock this user. Unblocking will allow him/her to send messages to you and see your status and last known presence.
All new messages sent in this chat will NOT be encrypted.\nDisable encryption only if your contact does not have a personal key.

Authentication to a Kontalk server failed the last time we tried to connect. It could be a temporary server failure or, most probably, the server is refusing your personal key. We recommend deleting your Kontalk account from Android system settings and register again (you will lose all of your Kontalk messages though).
Kontalk is running in the background
No application available to invite users.
Select behavior of enter button in keyboard
Password must be at least %d characters.
Tap the mic to begin recording.
Tap and hold the mic to record.
Unable to change the personal key password.
Access to external storage was denied.
Files smaller than this size will always be downloaded automatically
Enter a value in KB. Set to 0 to never download automatically.
Your buddy is using an older version of Kontalk. Some features might not work correctly.
Please verify with the user that he/she reinstalled Kontalk or regenerated his/her key intentionally, otherwise communication could be compromised!
Please verify with the user that his/her fingerprint matches the one displayed in the identity dialog, otherwise communication could be compromised!
Identity of some group members have not been verified.

string.name: about_credits_devteam
string.b: Kontalk is brought to you by:

resources.string: The owner (%s) left the group. No one can add or remove members.
You were removed from this group
You won\'t be able to enter this group again after you leave.
All unverified identities will be marked as ignored.
This is a group chat message. You\'re using an old version of Kontalk or your client doesn\'t support the group chat protocol. Please upgrade to the latest version!
Kontalk requires to be enabled in Protected Apps to function properly.
Kontalk requires to be whitelisted from battery optimization to function properly. We promise we won\'t hog your battery.
Please mark Kontalk as not optimized in the next screen.
Couldn\'t find battery optimization settings, bringing you to system settings.
Group chats will only have their chat history deleted unless the checkbox above is selected.
Activate this if you want Kontalk to be active in the background when going low on resources. A sticky notification will be displayed
Kontalk requires this settings to work correctly on this device
Server at %1$s is requesting to accept terms of service.
Shoot the bar code below or input the following data manually from your other device.
Network not available. Please retry later.
Input the requested data below as it appears on your other device.
No valid data found in the barcode.
Open Kontalk on the other device, choose menu > Settings > Maintenance > Register device. A secret code and a barcode representing it will be displayed.
I lost my old account or device
You denied access to contacts. You must open the chat you want manually.
Kontalk needs access to contacts in order to function properly. How can it know the people you can chat with??\nYou may cancel now, but you will be asked again once you\'ve registered.
Kontalk needs access to contacts in order to function properly. How can it know the people you can chat with??\nYou can allow access to contacts from Android settings.
You denied access to contacts. You won\'t be able to see changes in contacts here.
We need access to your camera in order to scan the barcode from the other device.
We need access to your camera to take pictures.
We need access to your camera to take pictures. Also, if you grant write access to storage, we will publish pictures to your gallery automatically.
We need access to the microphone for recording your voice and access to external storage to save your recordings.
Kontalk needs access to local storage to store media.
Unable to save your photo to the gallery.
Some attachments were not saved due to errors.
We need access to your location if you want to share it.
If you allow Kontalk to manage phone calls, it can automatically detect your phone number.\nKontalk won\'t use the granted permission for anything else.
Permission is required to download media
Emoji can\'t be used in multi-window mode.
Can read from and write to the Kontalk messages database
Can read from and write to the Kontalk users database and keyring
Required to keep Kontalk service alive
Show again tutorial hints throughout the app
Use this button to open a chat with someone.
You can enable the dark theme in Settings > Appearance.
You can share pictures, recordings and more.
Tap the toolbar to view contact information.
Tap the toolbar to view members and edit your group.

plurals.name: confirm_will_delete_threads
plurals.item: The selected chat will be deleted.
The selected chats will be deleted.
